channel.title: Transgenic Crops on Vivian Balakrishnan
channel.description: Recent content in Transgenic Crops on Vivian Balakrishnan

item.title: Whole Earth Discipline
item.description: Peter Schwartz highly recommended this book when we met for dinner last week. It has been a mind blowing journey traversing ecology, urbanisation, climate change, transgenic crops, nuclear energy and geoengineering. We don’t have to agree on everything, but we must think carefully through these issues, and be prepared to change our minds as new information emerges.
